com.slaterama.qslib.alpha.app

Class RetainedInstanceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.slaterama.qslib.alpha.app.RetainedInstanceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatternManager

    public class RetainedInstanceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
    A helper class to easily retain values and class instances across configuration changes in Activities and Fragments.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RetainedInstanceManager.RetainedFragment
      A retained Fragment associated with this RetainedInstanceManager.
      protected static class  RetainedInstanceManager.RetainedSystemInstanceKey
      A special class used by descendants of the RetainedInstanceManager to register their RetainedSystemInstanceValues.
      protected static interface  RetainedInstanceManager.RetainedSystemInstanceValue
      An interface representing the information that descendants of the RetainedInstanceManager wish to retain across Activity re-creation (such as from a configuration change).

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.Map

        java.util.Map.Entry<K,V>

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      String value used to find the retained fragment used to store retained values and class instances.
      private static java.util.Map<android.app.FragmentManager,RetainedInstanceManager.RetainedFragment> sPendingFragmentMap
      A static map used to store pending retained fragments until they have been successfully added to the fragment manager.

      • values

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> values()
        Returns a Collection of the values contained in this RetainedInstanceManager. The Collection is backed by this RetainedInstanceManager so changes to one are reflected by the other. The Collection supports remove(Object), removeAll(Collection), retainAll(Collection), and clear() operations, and it does not support add(E) or addAll(Collection) operations.

        This method returns a Collection which is the subclass of AbstractCollection. The iterator() method of this subclass returns a "wrapper object" over the iterator of this RetainedInstanceManager's entrySet(). The size() method wraps this RetainedInstanceManager's size() method and the contains(Object) method wraps this RetainedInstanceManager's containsValue(Object) method.

        The collection is created when this method is called at first time and returned in response to all subsequent calls. This method may return different Collection when multiple calls are made to this method, since it has no synchronization performed.

        Specified by:
        values in interface java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
        Returns:
        A collection of the values contained in this RetainedInstanceManager.
